input.sentences: an absolutely amazing trip at the fair .
here we saw the monkey maze that my husband dared me to go in .
the ferris wheel that me and honey enjoyed riding .
the swings that we are getting on next .
here is a view of us leaving the fair .
output.sentences: We planned to meet at the ice cream stand in the middle of the carnival.
We got lost in the maze after that.
Then floated in the sky with a birds eye view of the entire carnival.
We stayed swinging for most of the night.
As we left we had a wonderful view of something we still remember to this day after 50 years of marriage...it was our first date.
